content.en: Holographic advancements: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of digital holography. These algorithms aim to improve the reconstruction of 3D objects from digital holograms, phase unwrapping, design of phase-only computer holograms, elimination of speckle noise, wavefront reconstruction, image reconstruction, phase hologram generation, and more. The algorithms utilize iterative processes, phase retrieval methods, Bayesian frameworks, and other techniques to enhance the quality and accuracy of holographic imaging.
content.da: Holografiske fremskridt: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for feltet digital holografi. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre rekonstruktionen af 3D-objekter fra digitale hologrammer, faseafvikling, design af fase-baserede computerhologrammer, eliminering af speckle-støj, bølgefront-rekonstruktion, billedrekonstruktion, fasehologram-generering og mere. Algoritmerne anvender iterative processer, fasegenvindingsmetoder, Bayesian-rammer og andre teknikker for at forbedre kvaliteten og nøjagtigheden af holografisk billeddannelse.
